questions.question_text_1: A 5 μF and a 10 μF capacitor are connected in parallel across a voltage source. The charge stored in the 10 μF capacitor will be twice that stored in the 5 μF capacitor.

questions.question_text_1: A capacitor C1 of 1 μF is connected across a series combination of two capacitors C2 and C3 as shown in the figure below. C2 = 2C3 and the arrangement is connected across a DC source. If a voltage of 16 V is measured across C3 , the charge on C1 is ____________μC.
